attributes.action: require all MP's carry out the majority vote to leave the EU not the MP's view
attributes.background: if you vote in an election for a political party and they win you are not delayed for 2 years and then asked to have a second vote to make sure your wanted the out come you voted for. the vote was out just get on with it and leave! renumber they need us more than we need them!

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/243319
